wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Elliott (born 1870) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Accrington and Woolwich Arsenal. He started his career playing for Notts Rangers and Gainsborough Trinity before joining Accrington. He played as an inside forward for Arsenal and scored 10 goals. He also joined Tottenham Hotspur in 1894, but played on one game for them in a friendly, as he decided to returned to Nottingham and joined Nottingham Forest the same year.
